_header: Man beware or thou knit thee fast

BodEngPoete1.Transcription:
Man be war or þou knyte þe fastOftyn ran Rewth at þe
                    lastþis wrat I oftyn poverte partyth companyRed þis & by
                    not
BodEngPoete1.Editions:
Bad Key: Wright1847: 35.
Masters,  James Edwin,
                        ed.  
             Rymes of the Minstrels.
         Shaftesbury, Dorset: High House Press, 1927; anonymous: 17.
